page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN TANYFRON
page.content:
{Tanyfron}has a very small but close knit Community.At one time the majority of the men would have been employed either at one of the coal mines which existed in the Wrexham area or at the local{Brymbo} {Steelworks,}which specialises in the production of high grade steel.The steelworks was extended in the early 1980's at a cost of approximately Â£50 million which has helped secure its place as a major steel producing plant in the country.
There are two or three slag heaps in the area of Tanyfron which lays claim to the fact that this particular set of squares lies on the North Wales coalfield.
